reference_summary:
9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor high-quality beauty products, including cosmetics and hair care. Their recent purchase of oversized scrunchies highlights an interest in versatile accessories that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal.

- **Value for Money:** The user remains critical of overpriced items but demonstrates an increasing willingness to invest in quality products that deliver significant benefits. Their positive experience with multiple recent purchases indicates growing confidence in selecting high-performing items.

- **Experience with Vendors:** While cautious about vendor integrity, satisfactory interactions with recent purchases encourage the user to explore reputable sellers that prioritize quality and customer care.

- **Sentiment Towards Reviews:** The user still relies heavily on credible reviews but appreciates products that exceed expectations. Their enthusiastic review of the scrunchies reflects an evolving sentiment toward items that bring joy and satisfaction.

- **Feedback and Resolution:** The user continues to expect satisfactory resolutions for underwhelming products. Their willingness to recommend effective items shows a developing trust in brands that consistently deliver quality.

- **Overall Attitude:** The user remains critical of misleading quality claims but is increasingly embracing products that genuinely prove effective. Recent positive experiences indicate a notable shift towards a more optimistic view of beauty and accessories that meet their standards.
